title: Bright Home Shiksha Samiti Nanauta Saharanpur
detailsOfAchievement: The Bright Home Public School running under control of Bright Home Shiksha Samiti, Nanauta, Saharanpur, achieved its first achievement when it was affiliated with CBSE one of its kind in this region before this institution there was no English Medium school affiliated to CBSE. After being affiliated with CBSE in April 2000 the school have stood with so many achievements e.g. students being passed out from this institution have secured their places in foreign countries , government field and with some big name in India. Recently during the month of October, November & December 2014, school has organized many programmes for the welfare of the society i.e. Run for Unity (on the occasion brithday of Sardar Valabh Bhai Patel), Swacch Bharat Campaign etc. In December 2014, our students proved themselves at 1st position in volleyball tournament at district level. Every year we organized Annual Sports and Cultural Programmes and many curricular activities to make our students bold and face to meet to challenges. In Class-XII Board Examination, one of our students secured 95% marks in the session 2013-14. In 2011 and continue, our school has been picked out as a CBSE board Examination centre for Class-X & XII. Being located even in a rural area, this institution has proved itself to provide quality education not less than any big city.

sourceOfFunds.purpose: No, We have not received any kind of grant from any where during the financial year 2018-19. All kind of expenditures, g.i.e . Approx 35 students from poor families have been getting free education on 100% basic. More than 100 students pay only 50% fees.
